epic.title: Agile Webstore Build
epic.summary: Implement an ASP.NET e-commerce site (clothing) allowing browsing, ordering (PayPal or COD), and admin order/product management.

features.title: Home Page
features.description: Landing page, site role display and navigation to key pages.

stories.title: Build header
stories.description: Implement page header with site title and role display.
acceptance_criteria: Header displays site title text
Header shows user role placeholder (e.g., 'Visitor') when not authenticated and username when signed in
Header layout is responsive across common breakpoints

stories.title: Add main navigation
stories.description: Build main navigation with links to Clothing, Order Us, Contact Us, About Us, Track.
acceptance_criteria: Navigation contains working links to each listed page
Links navigate to correct client or server routes
Mobile collapsible menu functions under 768px
stories.raw_text_reference: Clothing Order Us Contact Us About Us Track

stories.title: Add hero CTA
stories.description: Add prominent CTA and featured product area on the home page.
acceptance_criteria: CTA button visible and labeled 'BUY NOW' or equivalent
Featured area displays at least 3 products
Clicking CTA navigates to product listing or product detail

features.title: Clothing Page
features.description: Product catalog page showing product metadata, images and category filters.

stories.title: Implement product grid
stories.description: Implement product grid with image, Product ID, name and cost for each item.
acceptance_criteria: Each product card shows image, Product ID, name and cost
Placeholder image shown when image missing
Grid supports pagination or lazy-load for >20 items

stories.title: Add category filter
stories.description: Add category filter UI (e.g., Polo T Shirts) and wire it to the product list.
acceptance_criteria: Selecting a category filters displayed products
Category state reflected in URL query params
Filter works with pagination
stories.raw_text_reference: Choose your category : Polo T Shirts

stories.title: Show product modal
stories.description: Show product description and open image/details modal on product click.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking product opens modal with image and description
Modal includes 'Order this Product' or 'Add to Cart' action
Modal closes on ESC and close button
stories.raw_text_reference: This page consists of product details.

features.title: Order Us Page
features.description: Order creation page where registered users choose quantities and submit orders.

stories.title: Add quantity selector
stories.description: Build quantity selector and add-to-cart behavior for each product row.
acceptance_criteria: Quantity selector allows integers â‰¥ 0
Clicking 'Add' updates cart with correct product ID and quantity
UI shows confirmation/toast after add
definition_of_ready: Add-to-cart API or local store decided

stories.title: Create cart summary
stories.description: Implement cart summary UI showing items, quantities and subtotal.
acceptance_criteria: Cart lists product name, unit price, quantity and line total
Subtotal and grand total display including taxes/delivery if applicable
Cart persists for authenticated users across reloads
stories.raw_text_reference: Once users order item they are able to see ordered products and grand total.

stories.title: Create order endpoint
stories.description: Create server-side order submission endpoint that saves order with date and status.
acceptance_criteria: POST /orders accepts order payload and returns order ID
Order stored with fields: Client, Product, Quantity, Price, Date, OrderShipped
Endpoint validates required fields and returns 400 on bad input
stories.raw_text_reference: Orders: ID, Client, Product, Quantity, Price, Date, OrderShipped

features.title: Contact Us Page
features.description: Contact form and admin message handling.

stories.title: Build contact form
stories.description: Implement contact form fields: name, email, message and submit button.
acceptance_criteria: Form validates required fields client-side
Submission returns success status and clears inputs
Form shows inline errors for invalid email format
stories.raw_text_reference: Your Name ... Your Email ... Your Message ... Submit

stories.title: Persist submissions
stories.description: Persist contact submissions and notify admin.
acceptance_criteria: Submissions stored in a contact submissions table
Admin receives notification or sees submission in admin UI
Submission record includes timestamp and submitter email
stories.raw_text_reference: ContactUs page is available to contact Admin for queries.

stories.title: Admin contact view
stories.description: Create admin view to list and reply to contact messages.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view submissions with unread/read status
Admin can send reply that emails the user
Replies logged against submission
stories.raw_text_reference: ContactUs page is available to contact Admin for queries.

features.title: Register and Login
features.description: User account creation and authentication flows.

stories.title: Build registration form
stories.description: Implement registration form with username, password, confirm password and email.
acceptance_criteria: Form validates password confirmation and email format
Successful registration creates user record and returns success
New user receives confirmation (email or UI message)
stories.raw_text_reference: UserName Password Confirm Password Email Register

stories.title: Implement login
stories.description: Implement login flow with optional 'Remember me' functionality.
acceptance_criteria: Valid credentials return auth token or session
'Remember me' persists session across browser restarts
Invalid credentials return clear errors
stories.raw_text_reference: Login page for both users and administrators. Remember me on this computer.

stories.title: Assign default role
stories.description: Ensure new registrations are assigned default role 'User'.
acceptance_criteria: Newly registered users have role field set to 'User'
Role visible in user admin view
Role cannot be set to Admin via public registration
stories.raw_text_reference: Once user register site, his default role will be 'User'.

features.title: Admin Tracking
features.description: Admin UI for product/user management and order tracking (COD and Instant Pay).

stories.title: Admin product CRUD
stories.description: Implement product CRUD in admin UI (add, edit, remove).
acceptance_criteria: Admin can create, update and delete product records
Changes reflect in public product catalog within TTL
Image uploads handled and validated
stories.raw_text_reference: Admin can add products, edit product information and add/remove product.

stories.title: User management UI
stories.description: Implement user management screens to add/edit/remove users.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view list of users and edit attributes
Admin can deactivate or remove a user
Audit log records user management actions
stories.raw_text_reference: Admin can add user, edit user information and can remove user.

stories.title: Order tracking dashboard
stories.description: Build order tracking dashboard (COD Open/Closed) and ship action updating OrderShipped.
acceptance_criteria: Orders list shows COD open/closed filters
'Mark as shipped' sets OrderShipped and records date
Customer receives confirmation email when order shipped
definition_of_ready: Orders table and status values defined
stories.raw_text_reference: COD | Open Orders COD | Closed Orders
